attributes.action: get security at fleetwood cemetery at night time so our loved ones are save from vandalism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to petition to help get some sort of security on fleetwood cemetery i.e. security guard locked gates cctv etc as in the past few weeks alot of the babies graves have been vandalised i.e thinks stolen, smashed etc. as all bereaved parents that this has happened to are very disgusted and appalled at the lack of support off our local council.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "get security at fleetwood cemetery at night time so our loved ones are save from vandalism."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21817


Prime Minister's Office
